attributes.action: Halt the Binn Farm Incinerator in rural Perthshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The building of this incinerator will turn the rural community of Abernethy, Perthsire in to the toxic dumping ground for Central Scotland. Similar sites at Perth, Invergordon and Peterhead have been rejected - why have Perth & Kinross Council granted the building of this incinerator? It contradicts their own waste management plans, and represents a significant health risk to the Perth area.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
